snippets.title: Print
snippets.content: Displays text in a JOptionPane. Requires the JOptionPane package to be imported to use this code.

snippets.title: Dropdown Value
snippets.content: Gets the value of the selected item in an HTML drop down list.
snippets.code:
var element = document.getElementById("DDList");
var choice = element.value;

snippets.title: On Click
snippets.content: The simplest way to add an onclick function to an element programmatically using vanilla JavaScript

snippets.title: View
snippets.content: A view is the most basic element in a SwiftUI application. It can be thought of similarly to a div in HTML except that every element in SwiftUI is a view.

snippets.title: Bochs Command
snippets.content: Used to run Bochs emulator using the bochsrc configuration text file.

snippets.title: Bochs Config
snippets.content: The setup for the bochs config file used to boot custom bootloader.
snippets.code:
megs: 32
romimage: file=/usr/local/Cellar/bochs/2.7/share/bochs/BIOS-bochs-latest, address=0xfffe0000
vgaromimage: file=/usr/local/Cellar/bochs/2.7/share/bochs/VGABIOS-lgpl-latest
floppya: 1_44=boot.com, status=inserted
boot: a
log: bochsout.txt
mouse: enabled=0
display_library: sdl2, options="autoscale"

snippets.title: Build Bootloader
snippets.content: Compile bootloader assembly code into a binary file and then a bootable disk image to run in parallels. Then adds a second boot iso so that parallels does not give an error.
snippets.code:
nasm -f bin boot.asm -o boot.bin

dd if=boot.bin of=Bootloader.iso bs=2k

dd if=/dev/zero of=boot.img bs=1024 count=1440

diskutil eraseVolume MS-DOS BOOTLOADER `hdiutil attach -nomount boot.img`

dd if=boot.bin of=boot.img bs=1 count=512 conv=notrunc

snippets.title: Parallels Command
snippets.content: Used to launch parallels desktop without the network configuration error.
